effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,580 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.

Valid only for tank specializations.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,192 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 286,477 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,334 Strength and absorbing 1.4 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

Valid only for tank specializations.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
